PositionHistory.Title: SUMMER INTERN
PositionHistory.Description: 2 MONTHS (INTERNSHIP), 41 MONTHS (FULL TIME) ZOVI.COM (E-Commerce) SUMMER INTERN APR'14-MAY'14 (2 Months) • Did a design benchmarking project across E- commerce industry on relevant competitive PROJECTS dimensions and suggested future design themes to be incorporated in Zovi's product portfolio. • Built an automated VBA based dashboard for Supplier/Vendor performance tracking.

PositionHistory.Title: BUSINESS ANALYST
PositionHistory.Description: TIBIL SOLUTIONS (Analytics Startup) BUSINESS ANALYST NOV'12 - APR'13 (6 Months) Role Member of the Analytics Consulting team. Tools: SAS, SQL and MS Excel and R-project. • Customer segmentation for a major South African Telecom operator • Customer segmentation based on usage behaviour and against key KPI's (ARPU, Churn). • Campaign Analytics for a major Telecom operator in Middle East PROJECTS • Customer behaviour was analysed on a customer base of 300,000 for pre, post and during campaign phases. • Revenue increase of up to 26% was reported for some effective campaigns. • Trained 30 employees on Big Data analytics and applications. ACHIEVEMENTS • Built a VBA based tool to automate data analysis and presentation. ELITMUS EVALUATION (Recruitment

PositionHistory.Title: TEAM LEAD
PositionHistory.Description: TEAM LEAD (Services Delivery) AUG'10- JUL'12 (23 Months) Consulting Startup) • Team Lead - Headed a 4 member National campus team handling end-to-end (Sales to Delivery) for premier engineering campus division of Elitmus. • Marketing - Implemented STP (Segmentation, targeting and Positioning) based online and Role offline marketing campaigns directly leading to record number of test-takers since inception. • Key Account Manager- Managed PAN India hiring for Elitmus' marquee clients, including Fortune 100 banks, Electronics Majors and Product Start-ups. I also helped build client's brand equity on campuses. • Led a key strategic change in the business model, resulting in an increase of 5% of company revenues in the 1st year. • Increased the number of test takers from leading colleges by 4 times in a span of 1.5 years. • Increased the number of partner colleges from 11 to 30 in a span of 2 years. ACHIEVEMENTS • Led a successful market entry, by taking the Elitmus brand to East India for the first time, signing up 10 leading colleges in the process. • Led Elitmus' first entry into Civil Engineering Job Sector. • Recruited and managed a team of 4 and mentored a successor.

PositionHistory.Title: EXECUTIVE TRAINEE
PositionHistory.Description: NTPC LTD EXECUTIVE TRAINEE (Power Plant) JUL'09- JUL'10 (12 Months)

Degree.Comments: DEGREE INSTITUTE CGPA YEAR MBA(PGDM) IIM AHMEDABAD 2.865/4 2015
Class XII / HSC (CBSE) K V NO 1, AFS BELGAUM 87.4% 2004

Class X/SSC (CBSE) K V NO 1, AFS BELGAUM 83.6% 2002 • IIM CAT score = 99.87 percentile. Ranked under 260 among more than 2 Lakh test takers across India. • Relevant Courses: Marketing, Strategy, Finance, Operations Management (PGP1); AMDA (Advanced Analytics), EC (Operations Strategy), ENVP (Entrepreneurship), MCVD (Sales and Distribution). POSITIONS OF RESPONSIBILITY • PGP1 Core Member, Genesys (The Technology Club) - Weekly Newsletter, Tech Blog. IIM Ahmedabad • PGP1 Core Member, Prakriti (The Nature Club) - Inter Dorm Energy competition. • Convenor (Hospitality) - Annual Cultural Festival (15000+ Footfall); Team size of 20. NIT Surathkal • Member (National Service Scheme) - Organised Blood donation and Beach cleaning drives. EXTRA-CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES AND HOBBIES • Teaching - Part time faculty of IMS India - Bangalore for Quant, Data Analysis and Logical Reasoning. '12 • Travel - Managed various company level outings (Domestic and International) at Elitmus. '10-12

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Praveen Hatti's experience appears to be concentrated in Marketing / Data & Analytics, with exposure to Information Technology / Database. Praveen Hatti's experience appears to be LOWER-TO-MID LEVEL, with about 4 years of experience, with several years tenure in management, including a somewhat high-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory:
The following management-related items were found: • Recruited and managed a team of 4 and • Trained 30 employees on Big Data analytics and applications.
Starting on 8/1/2010, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 23 months: Title: TEAM LEAD for Services Delivery Starting on 7/1/2009, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 13 months: Title: EXECUTIVE TRAINEE for NTPC LTD, Power Plant
